HTC today unveiled three new devices based around gaming-specific hardware like SteamVR that offer full 360 degrees of freedom (similarly, Google Cardboard has already become popular). This year marks Valve Day with upcoming games titles such as Portal two; though it might be too soon now after having launched more than eight months ago - maybe even earlier!
